captions.text: "Quick Change"!
Dani, Elidio and Bella will play.

In this game, they will improvise a scene,
and whenever I say 'change'

they will have to change the
last thing they have said or done.

If I say 'more', they will
have to get more intense,

if I say 'less', they will
have to get less intense.
Please, give me some random objects.

- Kick scooter!
- Kick scooter!

"Quick Change", I say 'change', they
change what they have said or done,
and the title is 'Kick Scooter', go.
Mrs. Shooter! Mrs. Shooter!

- Hi. - Mrs. Shooter, where's
the kick scooter I left here?

- It was next to the computer.
- Oh yes, that kid took it!

- The kid took it? - Yes! I saw him,
he went here, he left and disappeared.

- He vanished.
- A kid! A kid!

- A little boy, like this!
- Change!

- Very little, like this!
- Change!

He was a man grown!
A big boy, just like...
You let he get in here, Mrs. Shooter?

- Well, I didn't let him! But what would I say...
- Less!

- Well, I didn't really let him...
- Less!

- Well, I didn't really let him...
- Less!

Sir, to do the police report,
I'll need to know what was stolen.
It was a kick scooter.
Change the face expression.
A kick scooter!
Change!

- A kick scooter!
- I can't believe it!

A kick scooter? Next to the computer?
That's where I keep mine too.

- And how did this individual looked like?
- I didn't see him, it was Mrs. Shooter!

- Mrs. Shooter?
- Yes!

- Didn't see the kick scooter?
Next to the computer? - Yes!
That's what I do in my home...

- Mrs. Shooter, let's do the facial composite.
- Change!

- Mrs. Shooter, come here to do
the facial composite. - Change!
Here comes Mrs. Shooter!

Mrs. Shooter is wearing a
typical cleaning lady outfit

and now will make
the invader's facial composite.
Mrs. Shooter, please.

- How are you?
- What did he look like, Mrs. Shooter?

- Big!
- Big.
More!

- He was bigger than big.
- More!

- He was a giant!
- More!

- He was very giant!
- More!

He was three times bigger than the
giant from that beanstalk story...

Our cast can't do that, Mrs. Shooter,
Andy is the tallest one!

- And how did his face look like?
- It was kinda disfigured...
You don't need to try too hard...
You were saying?

- He was... - I'd like to
reassure you, we made a search,

- and we found two suspects.
- Two suspects, great!

I want you to see the
suspects and tell me...
Hold the sign!
Mrs. Shooter, which one of these...

- Mrs. Shooter, please...
- I'm getting anxious...

- They can't see us, right?
- No, they can't.
Change!
Change!
Mrs. Shooter, which one of them?
That one!
Bald guy, can you step ahead?
Change!

- Bald guy, can you give two steps
ahead, please? - Change!

Bald guy, can you give two steps ahead
and then do a flip and a dance, please?
That's an order, this is the police!

Quick Change!
He's amazing, Daniel Tauszig!

He makes the crowds go wild
with his dancing, doesn't he?

Not only he moves us with his music, but
he makes us rethink our lives with his dance!

- He's a complete artist!
- I'm rethinking: Why did I call him?
He's a complete artist, dude!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

WATCH POLITICAL CAMPAIGN
RICARDO REIS / ÁLVARO CAMPOS

WATCH MORE IMPROVÁVEL
WITH EDU / WITH BELLA / QUICK CHANGE

WATCH MORE
SKETCHES 1ST SEASON / EM BREVES
